contentrichtext.text: __NOTOC__ {{For|other uses of this term|Triple Alliance (disambiguation)}} The '''Triple Alliance''' (1668) of [[England]], [[Sweden]], and the [[Dutch Republic|United Provinces]] was formed to halt the expansion of [[Louis XIV of France|Louis XIV]]'s [[France]] in the [[War of Devolution]]. The alliance never engaged in combat against France, but it was enough of a threat to force Louis to halt his offensive and sign the [[Treaty of Aix-la-Chapelle (1668)| Treaty of Aix-la-Chapelle]] with Spain. ==See also== *[[List of treaties]] ==References== *Lynn, John A. ''The French Wars 1667-1714.'' London: Osprey Publishing, 2002. ISBN 1-84176-361-6 ==External links== *[http://www.ieg-mainz.de/likecms/index.php?site=site.htm&dir=&nav=&siteid=133&treaty=1129&page=1&lastsiteid=77&sq=%26is_fts%3D1%26filter_select%3D%26filter_wt%3D%26filter_id%3D%26filter_l%3D%26filter_p%3D%26searchlang%3Dde%26searchstring%3D1668%26date%3D%26year_from%3D%26year_till%3D%26location%3D Scan of the Dutch-English treaty of alliance (23 Jan 1668 in Den Haag, in Latin, IEG Mainz)] *[http://www.ieg-mainz.de/likecms/index.php?site=site.htm&dir=&nav=&siteid=133&treaty=76&lastsiteid=77&searchquery=%26is_fts%3D1%26filter_select%3D%26filter_wt%3D%26filter_id%3D%26filter_l%3D%26filter_p%3D%26searchlang%3Dde%26searchstring%3D1668%26date%3D%26year_from%3D%26year_till%3D%26location%3D Scan of the convention about the accession of Sweden to the Den Haag alliance (13/23 Jan 1668, in Latin, IEG Mainz)] *[http://www.ieg-mainz.de/likecms/index.php?site=site.htm&dir=&nav=&siteid=133&treaty=1132&lastsiteid=77&searchquery=%26is_fts%3D1%26filter_select%3D%26filter_wt%3D%26filter_id%3D%26filter_l%3D%26filter_p%3D%26searchlang%3Dde%26searchstring%3D1668%26date%3D%26year_from%3D%26year_till%3D%26location%3D Scan of the Triple Alliance (25 Apr/5 May 1668 in Westminster, in Latin, IEG Mainz)] [[Category:Political history of France]] [[Category:17th-century military alliances]] [[Category:1668 treaties]] [[Category:Treaties of the Dutch Republic]] [[Category:Treaties of the Swedish Empire]] [[Category:Military alliances involving England]] [[Category:Military alliances involving Sweden]] [[Category:Military alliances involving the Dutch Republic]] [[Category:1668 in the Dutch Republic]] [[Category:1668 in England]] [[Category:1668 in Sweden]]
